Name: Last Sinner
About the game: Judgment Day has come. Sinners on earth do not want to ascend and decide to stay in order to live in chaos and permissiveness until the Antichrist destroys the world. You have to collect more sins than the rest to stay on earth and not ascend! Last Sinner is a Top Down Shooter with elements of a Royal Battle. You are one of the few survivors of Doomsday, but you, like others, do not want to ascend and therefore, must cause chaos on earth in order to stay. Shoot at others, knock out weapons and collect sins, but remember, the fire of purification is approaching and you can lose at any time. Features of the game: - Battle Royale - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Difficulty
